common.addressCopiedSuspicious: Mismatch between the copied address and the one in the clipboard.

stars.placeholder: Accounts that you star on the <1><0>Accounts</0></1> page will now appear here!

emptyState.title: 아직 암호화 자산이 없습니까?
emptyState.desc: <1><0>{{managerAppName}}</0></1> 앱이 설치되어 있는지 확인하고 수신을 시작하십시오.
emptyState.descToken: Make sure the <1><0>{{managerAppName}}</0></1> app is installed and start receiving <3><0>{{ticker}}</0></3> and <5><0>{{tokenList}}</0> tokens</5>

account.availableBalanceTooltip: This amount can be sent anytime.
account.frozenAssetsTooltip: Frozen assets are used in the Tron voting process. This represents your total number of votes.
account.delegatedAssetsTooltip: These are your currently delegated assets
account.undelegatingTooltip: These are your assets currently being undelegated

blacklistToken.title: Hide token
blacklistToken.desc: This action will hide all <1><0>{{tokenName}}</0></1> accounts, you can restore their visibility at any time from <3>Settings</3>

emptyAccountTile.desc: 더 많은 암호화 자산을 관리하려면 계정을 추가하십시오.

currentAddress.title: 현재 주소
currentAddress.messageIfUnverified: Verify that the shared address matches the one on your device
currentAddress.messageIfSkipped: Your {{name}} address has not been confirmed on your Ledger device. Please verify it for optimal security.

dashboard.title: Install some apps on your device
dashboard.desc: Go to the Manager to install apps on your device. You can add accounts once you have apps on your device.

accounts.title: Add an account to get started
accounts.desc: Add an account to start managing your crypto assets. You should have installed the apps for your crypto assets on your device.

buttons.installApp: Go to Manager to install apps

genuinecheck.deviceInBootloader: Device in Bootloader mode. Click on <1>Continue</1> to update it.

tokensList.title: Tokens
tokensList.placeholder: To add tokens, simply send them to your Ethereum address.

overview.title: Ledger Live accounts update
overview.successDescPlu: Your {{assets}} accounts are now updated and ready to use
overview.successDesc: Your {{assets}} account is now updated and ready to use
overview.mobileDesc: Click the button below to export your updated accounts to the Ledger Live mobile app.
overview.description: New features in Ledger Live require an update of your accounts.
overview.footer: You need your Ledger Device to complete the update
overview.pendingDevices: 1 account could not be updated. Please connect the device associated to the account below
overview.pendingDevices_plural: {{totalMigratableAccounts}} accounts could not be updated. Please connect the device associated to the account below

scanning.title: {{currencyName}} update in progress...
scanning.description: Please wait while your accounts are updated

addAccounts.title: 계정 추가
addAccounts.tokensTip: {{token}} ({{ticker}}) is an {{tokenType}} token. You can receive tokens directly on an {{currency}} account.
addAccounts.successDescription: 더 많은 계정을 추가하거나 포트폴리오로 돌아가십시오.
addAccounts.successDescription_plural: 더 많은 계정을 추가하거나 포트폴리오로 돌아가십시오.

createNewAccount.noOperationOnLastAccount: <1><0>{{accountName}}</0></1> 계정에서 받기 전에 새 계정을 추가할 수 없습니다.

operationDetails.title: 작업 세부 정보
operationDetails.tokenTooltip: This operation is related to the following token operations
operationDetails.subAccountTooltip: This operation is related to the following subaccount operations

DeviceAction.allowAppPermission: Open the {{wording}} app on your device
DeviceAction.quitApp: Quit the application on your device

deviceStorage.incomplete: Some apps were not recognized. Please uninstall and reinstall them.

applist.placeholder: No match for the search and selected filters
applist.placeholderNoAppsInstalled: No apps installed on your device
applist.placeholderGoToCatalog: Go to the App catalog to install apps
applist.noResultsDesc: Please verify the spelling and try again

installSuccess.title: App successfully installed, you can now add your {{app}} accounts
installSuccess.title_plural: Apps successfully installed, you can now add your accounts

updatable.title: Updates available
updatable.progressWarning: Do not quit Manager during update.

item.updateAllOutOfMemory: Not enough storage to update, please uninstall some apps
item.addAccountWarn: Please wait for the app updates to finish
item.useAppForToken: {{tokenName}} tokens can be managed using the {{appName}} app
item.tokenAppDisclaimer: {{tokenName}} is an {{tokenType}} token using the {{appName}} app. To manage {{tokenName}}, <1>install the {{appName}} app</1> and send the tokens <3>to your {{appName}} account</3>
item.tokenAppDisclaimerInstalled: {{tokenName}} is an {{tokenType}} token using the {{appName}} app. To manage {{tokenName}}, <1>open the {{appName}} app</1> and send the tokens <3>to your {{appName}} account</3>

uninstall.title: Uninstall all
uninstall.subtitle: Uninstall all apps?
uninstall.description: Don’t worry, uninstalling apps does not affect your crypto assets. You can reinstall apps in the App catalog.

dependencyInstall.title: {{dependency}} app is required
dependencyInstall.description: The {{dependency}} app will also be installed because the {{app}} app needs it.

dependencyUninstall.title: Uninstall {{app}} and its related apps?
dependencyUninstall.description: Some of your installed apps are linked to {{app}} app. They will be uninstalled as well.

firmware.followTheGuide: Follow our step by step update guide
firmware.prepareSeed: Make sure your 24-word recovery phrase is written down on your Recovery sheet and accessible, as a precaution.
firmware.disclaimerTitle: You are about to install <1>firmware version {{version}}</1>.
firmware.downloadingUpdateDesc: Please wait while the update installer is being downloaded
firmware.appsAutoUninstallTitle: All applications will be uninstalled from your device
firmware.appsAutoUninstallBullet1: <0><0>Don't worry</0></0>, this does not affect your crypto assets
firmware.appsAutoUninstallBullet2: You will be able to reinstall them all after the update

modal.confirmIdentifierText: 장치의 식별자가 아래의 식별자와 같은지 확인하십시오. 확인하려면 오른쪽 버튼을 누르고 PIN 코드를 입력하십시오.
modal.mcuSecond: Press the left button and hold it while you reconnect the USB cable until the <1><0>{{repairProcessing}}</0></1> screen appears
modal.mcuBlueFirst: Press and hold the side button for 10 seconds to turn off the device. Release the button.
modal.mcuBlueSecond: Press and hold the button for at least 5 seconds until the Boot Options are displayed. Tap Bootloader Mode

resetSteps.connect: Connect the {{deviceName}} to your computer using the USB cable.
resetSteps.turnOn: Press the button on the device to turn it on.
resetSteps.falsePin: Enter three wrong PIN codes to reset the device.
resetSteps.turnOff: Press and hold the side button until {{action}} is displayed.
resetSteps.boot: Press and hold the side button until {{option}} is displayed
resetSteps.recoveryMode: Tap {{mode}} Mode. Wait until the dashboard appears.
resetSteps.openLive: Open the Manager in Ledger Live.
resetSteps.uninstall: Click on the grey trash icon for all apps currently installed on the {{deviceName}}. This makes room for the firmware installer.
resetSteps.disclaimer: Note: Your funds are not affected by this operation, the private keys to access your crypto assets in the blockchain remain secured on your Recovery sheet.

rewards.title: Rewards
rewards.description: Congratulations! You earned <1>{{amount}}</1> by voting for validators.
rewards.info: Rewards can be claimed once every 24 hours.

confirmation.title: Confirmation

success.title: Rewards claimed
success.text: Your rewards have been added to your balance.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

amount.title: Amount
amount.bandwidthDescription: Bandwidth points are used to make transactions without paying TRX for network fees. Choose Bandwidth to increase your daily free transactions.
amount.energyDescription: Energy points are required to execute smart contracts. If you don't run any smart contracts, there is no need to choose rewards in Energy.
amount.info: Frozen assets cannot be sent for 3 days.

tooltip.title: Transaction is under validation
tooltip.desc: You have to wait a minute before being able to vote

confirmation.title: Confirmation

success.textNRG: You will start earning Energy once the network has confirmed the freeze. You can shortly vote for Super Representatives to also earn rewards.
success.text: You will start earning Bandwidth once the network has confirmed the freeze. You can shortly vote for Super Representatives to also earn rewards.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

amount.title: Unfreeze
amount.info: Unfreezing will decrease your {{resource}} and will cancel your votes.

confirmation.title: Confirmation

success.text: Your assets have been unfrozen successfully. Your {{resource}} points will be decreased and your votes will be canceled.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

tezos.text: The amount received on a delegated account will be added to the total staked amount. Choose another account if you want to avoid this.

confirmation.title: 확인

success.title: 트랜잭션 전송됨
success.text: 블록 체인이 거래를 승인하면 계정 잔액이 업데이트됩니다.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

tezos.text: The amount to be sent will be deducted from the balance of your delegated account.

emptyState.description: You can now earn rewards by freezing and voting.
emptyState.votesDesc: Cast your votes for one or more representatives to start earning staking rewards.

voting.warnEarnRewards: You need at least {{amount}} to start earning rewards
voting.title: Claim rewards

remainingVotes.title: You still have {{amount}} votes remaining
remainingVotes.description: You can cast your remaining votes to earn more rewards

starter.title: Earn staking rewards
starter.description: Freeze your TRX to earn rewards while keeping full security and control of your assets.

bullet.access: You can unfreeze your assets after 3 days.
bullet.ledger: Freeze and vote securely with your Ledger device.

starter.termsAndPrivacy: Delegating your voting rights does not guarantee you will be paid any reward by your super representative.

freeze.title: Freeze
freeze.description: Freeze TRX to earn Bandwidth or Energy. You'll also be able to vote for Super Representatives.

unfreeze.title: Unfreeze
unfreeze.description: Unfreeze TRX if you want to spend them. You will no longer earn rewards.

vote.title: Vote
vote.description: Cast votes for Super Representatives to earn rewards.

vote.title: Cast votes
vote.description: Vote for one or more Super Representatives to start earning rewards.

superRepresentative.title: Super Representatives (SR)
superRepresentative.description: Super Representatives play a key role in governing the TRON community by ensuring basic functions, e.g. block generation and bookkeeping.

candidates.title: Candidates
candidates.description: 127 individuals elected through voting by the entire token holder community. Votes are updated once every 6 hours.

emptyState.description: Delegate your assets to one or more validators to start earning rewards.

starter.description: Delegate your ATOM to earn rewards while keeping full security  and control on your assets.
bullet: You’ll have to wait for 21 days to complete an undelegation
Delegate securely with your Ledger device

warning.description: Delegate ATOM asset can imply some losses if the chosen delegator doesn’t act rightfully on the network.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.label: Confirmation

success.title: Delegation sent
success.text: Delegation transaction broadcasted successfully. You should earn your first rewards soon depending on the validator.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

delegation.title: Earn rewards
delegation.delegationEarn: You can now earn {{name}} staking rewards by delegating your account.

starter.title: Earn staking rewards
starter.description: Delegate your Tezos account to a third-party validator to earn staking rewards while keeping full security and control of your assets

bullet.access: You can access your assets anytime.
bullet.ledger: Delegate securely with your Ledger device.

summary.title: Delegate account
summary.label: Summary
summary.termsAndPrivacy: Delegating your voting rights does not guarantee you will be paid any reward by your validator.

validator.title: Select validator
validator.description: You can select a validator by comparing the estimated reward rates

custom.title: Custom validator
custom.text: Please enter the address of the custom validator to delegate your account to.

confirmation.title: Confirmation
confirmation.label: Confirmation

success.title: Delegation sent
success.text: Delegation transaction broadcasted successfully. You should earn your first rewards within about 40 days, depending on the validator.
success.textUndelegated: Your account delegation will end once the operation is confirmed. You can delegate your account again at any time.

confirmation.broadcastError: Your transaction may have failed. Please check back in a few minutes to make sure your transaction did not go through before trying again.

banner.title: Earn rewards
banner.text: You can earn Tezos staking rewards by delegating your account

accounts.title: Export accounts
accounts.desc: Add your accounts in Ledger Live mobile. Your accounts will only synchronize with the blockchain, not between your mobile and desktop apps.

operations.title: Operation history
operations.desc: Save a CSV file of your account operations on your computer.

display.counterValueDesc: 잔액 및 작업 옆에 표시할 통화를 선택합니다.
display.regionDesc: Ledger Live의 시간대 설정에 사용되는 지역을 선택하십시오.
display.stockDesc: Western를 선택하면 시장가액이 파란색으로 증가합니다. Eastern을 선택하면 시장가액이 빨간색으로 증가합니다.

currencies.desc: Change settings for each of your crypto assets
currencies.select: Select a crypto asset to edit its settings.
currencies.confirmationsNbDesc: 트랜잭션이 확인된 것으로 표시되는 네트워크 확인 수를 설정합니다.

rates.desc:
Here are all the rates that are used to calculate countervalues.
Choose which rate providers are used for each rate.
rates.noCounterValue: We have no data for this trading pair

profile.passwordDesc: 계정 이름, 잔액, 트랜잭션 및 공용 주소를 포함하여 컴퓨터에 저장된 Ledger Live 데이터에 대한 무단 액세스 방지를 위해 암호를 설정하십시오.
profile.passwordAutoLockDesc: 비활성 상태가 계속되면 Ledger Live를 자동으로 잠급니다.
profile.softResetDesc: 블록 체인과 강제로 동기화하려면 Ledger Live 캐시를 지우십시오.
profile.hardResetDesc: 계정, 트랜잭션 내역 및 설정을 포함하여 컴퓨터에 저장된 모든 Ledger Live 데이터를 지웁니다.
profile.developerModeDesc: Manager에 개발자 및 testnet 앱을 표시합니다.
profile.analyticsDesc: Ledger가 사용자 경험을 향상시키는 방법을 이해하는 데 도움이 되는 분석을 활성화합니다. 여기에는 클릭, 페이지 방문, 리디렉션, 동작(전송, 수신, 잠금 등), 페이지 스크롤 끝, 앱 설치(해제) 및 버전, 앱 버전, 계정 수, 암호화 자산 및 작업, 세션 기간, Ledger 장치 유형 및 펌웨어가 포함됩니다.
profile.reportErrorsDesc: Ledger가 버그를 수정하는 데 도움이 되는 보고서를 자동으로 전송합니다.
profile.launchOnboardingDesc: 새 장치로 설정하거나 Ledger 장치를 복원합니다. 계정 및 설정이 유지됩니다.

about.desc: 앱 정보, 이용 약관 및 개인 정보 보호 정책.

help.desc: Ledger Live에 대해 자세히 알아보거나 도움을 받으실 수 있습니다.
help.faqDesc: 문제가 있습니까? 하드웨어 지갑과 함께 Ledger Live를 사용하여 도움을 받으십시오.
help.termsDesc: Ledger Live를 사용함으로써 귀하는 당사 이용 약관에 동의하는 것으로 간주됩니다.
help.privacyDesc: 수집되는 데이터와 그 이유 및 사용 방법을 알아보려면 당사 개인 정보 보호 정책을 참조하십시오.

experimental.desc: Try out experimental features and let us know what you think
experimental.disclaimer: These are experimental features we provide on an “as is” basis for our tech savvy community to test. They may change, break or be removed at any time. By enabling them, you agree to use them at your own risk.

hardResetModal.title: Ledger Live 재설정
hardResetModal.desc: 계정, 거래 내역 및 설정을 포함하여 컴퓨터에 저장된 모든 Ledger Live 데이터를 지웁니다. 암호화 자산에 액세스하기 위한 개인 키는 귀하의 Ledger 장치와 복구 시트에서 안전하게 보호됩니다.

softResetModal.title: 캐시 지우기
softResetModal.desc: 캐시를 지우면 네트워크가 강제로 다시 동기화됩니다. 설정 및 계정은 그대로 유지됩니다. 암호화 자산에 액세스하기 위한 개인 키는 귀하의 Ledger 장치와 복구 시트에서 안전하게 보호됩니다.

resetFallbackModal.title: 사용자 조치 필요
resetFallbackModal.part1: 캐시 폴더를 삭제할 수 없습니다. 폴더를 수동으로 삭제하십시오.
resetFallbackModal.part5: 그런 다음 앱을 정상적으로 다시 시작할 수 있습니다.

removeAccountModal.title: 계정 제거
removeAccountModal.desc: 암호화 자산에 영향을 미치지 않습니다. 계정은 언제나 다시 추가할 수 있습니다.

openUserDataDirectory.title: 사용자 데이터 보기
openUserDataDirectory.desc: 계정, 캐시 및 설정을 포함하여 컴퓨터에 저장된 사용자 데이터를 봅니다.

repairDevice.title: 계정, 거래 내역 및 설정을 포함하여 컴퓨터에 저장된 모든 Ledger Live 데이터를 지웁니다. 암호화 자산에 액세스하기 위한 개인 키는 귀하의 Ledger 장치와 복구 시트에서 안전하게 보호됩니다.
repairDevice.descSettings: 펌웨어 업데이트 중에 중단된 경우 이 도구를 사용하여 Ledger 장치를 복구하십시오.

exportLogs.title: Save logs
exportLogs.desc: Saving Ledger Live logs may be necessary for troubleshooting purposes.

hideEmptyTokens.title: Hide empty token accounts
hideEmptyTokens.desc: Hide token accounts with zero balance on the Accounts page.

tokenBlacklist.title: Hidden tokens
tokenBlacklist.desc: You can hide a token by right-clicking on it while in its parent screen and selecting 'Hide token'

setPassword.title: 암호 잠금
setPassword.subTitle: 암호 설정
setPassword.desc: 암호를 기억하십시오. 암호를 잊어버리면 Ledger Live를 재설정하고 계정을 다시 추가해야 합니다.

disablePassword.title: 암호 잠금 비활성화
disablePassword.desc: Ledger Live 데이터가 암호화되지 않고 컴퓨터에 저장됩니다. 여기에는 계정 이름, 거래 및 공용 주소가 포함됩니다.

update.updateAvailable: Ledger Live {{version}} is available for update
update.error: 업데이트 중 오류가 발생했습니다. 다시 다운로드하십시오.
update.nightlyWarning: This version cannot auto-update, please install the latest version manually

crash.title: Something went wrong
crash.description: Please check our support article for a possible solution. If the problem persists, save your logs using the button below and provide them to Ledger Support.

exportOperationsModal.title: Operation history
exportOperationsModal.desc: Select the accounts for which to save the operation history
exportOperationsModal.descSuccess: A CSV file of your operation history has been successfully saved in the selected folder

start.title: Ledger Live에 오신 것을 환영합니다.
start.themeDesc:
Let’s start by choosing how Ledger Live looks to you.
You can change this later at any time in your settings.

selectDevice.title: 장치 선택
selectDevice.usbOnlyTooltip: Ledger Live desktop currently does not support Bluetooth

disclaimer.note3: PIN 코드 또는 복구 구문이 미리 설정된 장치는 절대 사용하지 마십시오.

nano.step2: Press the left or right button to navigate through the on-screen instructions.
nano.step4: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons to validate.
nano.step5: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN code. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

nanoX.step3: 왼쪽 또는 오른쪽 버튼을 눌러 숫자를 선택합니다.
nanoX.step4: PIN 코드를 확인하려면 ✓를 선택합니다. 숫자를 지우려면 ⬅를 선택합니다

nano.step2: Press the left or right button to navigate through the on-screen instructions.
nano.step4: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons to validate.
nano.step5: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN code. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

nanoX.step2: {{productName}} 화면의 지시에 따라 두 개의 버튼을 동시에 누릅니다.
nanoX.step3: Press the left button to cancel <1><0>{{setUpAsNewDevice}}</0></1>.
nanoX.step4: Press the right button to select <1><0>{{restoreConfiguration}}</0></1>.

initialize.title: Write down your recovery phrase
initialize.desc: Your 24-word recovery phrase is the <1>only backup</1> of your private keys.

nano.step1: Write <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> in position 1 on a blank Recovery sheet.
nano.step2: 오른쪽 버튼을 눌러 계속한 다음 24 단어를 모두 기록합니다.
nano.step3: 복구 구문을 확인합니다. 두 버튼을 모두 눌러 각 단어를 선택하고 확인합니다.

blue.step1: 순서를 유지하면서 빈 복구 시트에 각 단어를 기록합니다.
blue.step2: Tap <1><0>{{seedNext}}</0></1> and write down all words until the <3><0>{{seedConfirmation}}</0></3> screen appears.
blue.step3: 각 단어를 입력하여 복구 구문을 확인합니다.

restore.title: 복구 구문 입력
restore.desc: Enter the recovery phrase from your Recovery phrase.

nano.step2: Enter the first letters of <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> until suggested words appear.
nano.step3: Choose <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> from the suggested words by pressing both buttons.

blue.step2: 복구 구문의 첫 단어를 입력합니다. 단어가 나타나면 해당 단어를 탭합니다.

disclaimer.note1: Anyone who gets your recovery phrase can take your crypto assets.
disclaimer.note2: Never use a device supplied with a PIN code or a recovery phrase.
disclaimer.note3: Store your recovery phrase in a secure location, out of sight.
disclaimer.note4: Ledger does not store your private keys, nor ever asks for it.

genuineCheck.title: 보안 체크리스트
genuineCheck.descGeneric: 계속하기 전에 보안 체크리스트의 작성을 완료하십시오.

desc.pinFailed: PIN 코드가 미리 설정된 장치는 절대 사용하지 마십시오. 의심스러운 경우 저희에게 문의하십시오.
desc.recoveryPhraseFailed: 자신의 장치에 표시된 복구 구문을 직접 저장하십시오. 의심스러운 경우 저희에게 문의하십시오.

setPassword.title: 암호 잠금(옵션)
setPassword.desc: 계정 이름, 거래 및 공용 주소를 포함하여 컴퓨터의 Ledger Live 데이터에 대한 무단 액세스 방지를 위해 암호를 설정하십시오

disclaimer.note2: 암호를 잊어버리면 Ledger Live를 재설정하고 계정을 다시 추가해야 합니다.
disclaimer.note3: Ledger Live 재설정은 암호화 자산에 영향을 미치지 않습니다.

analytics.title: 버그 및 분석
analytics.desc: Ledger 보안 제품 및 서비스 개선을 위해 익명의 데이터를 공유합니다.

shareAnalytics.title: 분석
shareAnalytics.desc: Ledger가 사용자 경험을 향상시키는데 도움을 주기 위해 분석을 활성화합니다.

mandatoryContextual.item7: 계정, 암호화 자산 및 작업 수
mandatoryContextual.item8: 전체 및 페이지 세션 지속 시간

sentryLogs.title: 버그 보고서
sentryLogs.desc: Ledger가 버그를 수정하는 데 도움이 되는 보고서를 자동으로 전송합니다.

technicalData.title: 기술 데이터*
technicalData.desc: Ledger는 사용자 경험을 향상시키기 위해 완전 익명화된 기술 데이터를 자동으로 수집합니다.

mandatoryContextual.title: 기술 데이터
mandatoryContextual.item2: Ledger Live 버전, 언어 및 지역

connectTroubleshooting.desc: Having a hard time connecting your device?

TransactionConfirm.title: Please confirm the operation on your device to send it
TransactionConfirm.warning: Always verify that your device displays the address exactly as provided by the {{recipientWording}}

titleWording.send: Please confirm the operation on your device to send it
titleWording.claimReward: Please confirm the operation on your device to claim your rewards
titleWording.freeze: Please confirm the operation on your device to freeze assets
titleWording.unfreeze: Please confirm the operation on your device to unfreeze your assets
titleWording.vote: Please confirm the operation on your device to cast your votes

Terms.title: Terms of Use
Terms.switchLabel: I have read and agree with the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

stellar.memoWarningText: When using a Memo, carefully verify the type used with the recipient

generic.title: {{message}}
generic.description: 무언가가 잘못되었습니다. 다시 시도하거나 저희에게 문의하십시오.

AccountAwaitingSendPendingOperations.title: There is an operation pending for this account.
AccountAwaitingSendPendingOperations.description: Please wait a few minutes and come back.

NoAccessToCamera.title: Please ensure your system has a camera, that it's not in use by another application and that Ledger Live has permission to use it.

CurrencyNotSupported.title: {{currencyName}} is not supported
CurrencyNotSupported.description: This crypto asset is not yet supported. Please contact us.

DeviceInOSUExpected.title: Sorry, update failed
DeviceInOSUExpected.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support

DeviceHalted.title: Please restart your Ledger device and retry
DeviceHalted.description: An unexpected error occurred, so please try again

DeviceSocketFail.title: Please restart your Ledger device and retry
DeviceSocketFail.description: An unexpected error occurred, so please try again. ({{message}})

DisconnectedDeviceDuringOperation.title: Oops, device disconnected
DisconnectedDeviceDuringOperation.description: The connection to the device was lost during an operation, please try again

FirmwareOrAppUpdateRequired.title: Firmware or app update required
FirmwareOrAppUpdateRequired.description: Please use the Manager to uninstall all apps and check if a firmware update is available before reinstalling them

HardResetFail.title: 죄송합니다. 재설정하지 못했습니다.
HardResetFail.description: 다시 시도하거나 의심스러운 경우 저희에게 문의하십시오.

LatestMCUInstalledError.title: 죄송합니다. 업데이트할 것이 없습니다.
LatestMCUInstalledError.description: 불필요하게 장치 마이크로 컨트롤러를 업데이트하려 했습니다. 장치에 문제가 있는 경우 Ledger 지원 센터에 문의하십시오.

LedgerAPI4xx.title: {{message}}
LedgerAPI4xx.description: Please check your connection and try again or contact Ledger Support.

LedgerAPI5xx.title: Sorry, try again.
LedgerAPI5xx.description: The server could not handle your request. Please try again at a later moment or contact Ledger Support. {{message}}

LedgerAPINotAvailable.title: 죄송합니다. {{currencyName}} 서비스를 사용할 수 없습니다.
LedgerAPINotAvailable.description: 다시 시도하거나 Ledger 지원 센터에 문의하십시오.

ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.title: 죄송합니다. 이미 설치되었습니다.
ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.description: 어떤 앱이 이미 설치되어 있는지 장치를 확인하십시오.

ManagerAppDepInstallRequired.title: {{dependency}} app required
ManagerAppDepInstallRequired.description: If you already have the {{dependency}} app installed, please reinstall it to get the latest version

ManagerAppDepUninstallRequired.title: Sorry, this app is required
ManagerAppDepUninstallRequired.description: You must first uninstall all apps that require the {{appName}} app

ManagerDeviceLocked.title: 장치를 잠금 해제하십시오.
ManagerDeviceLocked.description: 장치가 잠겨 있습니다. 먼저 잠금 해제하십시오.

ManagerFirmwareNotEnoughSpace.title: Uninstall all apps from your device
ManagerFirmwareNotEnoughSpace.description: The private keys providing access to your crypto assets will stay safe on your device and should be backed up on your recovery sheet.

ManagerNotEnoughSpace.title: 죄송합니다. 남아 있는 저장 공간이 충분하지 않습니다.
ManagerNotEnoughSpace.description: Uninstall some apps to make space. The private keys providing access to your crypto assets will stay safe on your device.

install.title: Finish app installation in progress?
install.description: Quitting the Manager will interrupt the app installation. Please finish the installation to install the apps in the queue.

uninstall.title: Finish app uninstallation in progress?
uninstall.description: Quitting the Manager will interrupt the app uninstallations in progress.

update.title: Finish app updates in progress?
update.description: Quitting the Manager will interrupt the app updates in progress.

ManagerUninstallBTCDep.title: 죄송합니다. 이 앱은 필요합니다.
ManagerUninstallBTCDep.description: Bitcoin 또는 Ethereum 앱을 마지막으로 제거하십시오

NoAddressesFound.title: 죄송합니다. 계정을 찾을 수 없습니다.
NoAddressesFound.description: 주소 계산이 잘못되었습니다. Ledger 지원 센터에 문의하십시오.

NotEnoughBalanceBecauseDestinationNotCre.title: 수취인 주소가 비활성화되어 있습니다. 활성화하려면 적어도 {{minimalAmount}}을(를) 보내십시오.

NotEnoughGas.title: ETH balance in parent account insufficient for network fees

TimeoutError.title: 죄송합니다. 시간이 초과되었습니다.
TimeoutError.description: 서버가 응답하는 데 시간이 너무 오래 걸렸습니다. 다시 시도하십시오.

TimeoutTagged.title: 죄송합니다. 시간이 초과되었습니다. ({{tag}})
TimeoutTagged.description: 서버가 응답하는 데 시간이 너무 오래 걸렸습니다

TransportRaceCondition.title: Something went wrong, please reconnect your device

DeviceShouldStayInApp.title: Please open the {{appName}} app
DeviceShouldStayInApp.description: Keep the {{appName}} app open while we look for your accounts

UnexpectedBootloader.title: 죄송합니다. 장치가 부트 로더 모드에 있어서는 안됩니다.

UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.title: Update canceled
UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.description: 다시 시도하거나 Ledger 지원 센터에 문의하십시오.

UserRefusedOnDevice.title: Action denied on device
UserRefusedOnDevice.description: 다시 시도하거나 의심스러운 경우 Ledger 지원 센터에 문의하십시오

TransactionRefusedOnDevice.title: Operation denied on device
TransactionRefusedOnDevice.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support in case of doubt

UserRefusedAddress.title: 수신 주소가 거부되었습니다.
UserRefusedAddress.description: 다시 시도하거나 의심스러운 경우 Ledger 지원 센터에 문의하십시오.

UpdateYourApp.title: 앱 업데이트가 필요합니다.
UpdateYourApp.description: Manager에서 {{managerAppName}} 앱을 제거한 후 다시 설치하십시오.

WrongDeviceForAccount.title: Something went wrong
WrongDeviceForAccount.description: Please check that your hardware wallet is set up with the recovery phrase or passphrase that belongs to the selected account.

DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.title: 앱 업데이트가 필요합니다.
DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.description: Uninstall and reinstall the {{managerAppName}} app in the Manager

CantOpenDevice.title: 죄송합니다. 장치에 연결할 수 없습니다.
CantOpenDevice.description: 장치가 감지되었지만 연결하지 못했습니다. 다시 시도하거나 문제가 지속되면 저희에게 문의하십시오.

ETHAddressNonEIP.title: 자동 확인을 사용할 수 없습니다. 주소를 신중하게 확인하십시오.

CantScanQRCode.title: 이 QR 코드를 스캔할 수 없습니다. 이 주소는 자동 확인을 지원하지 않습니다.

FeeNotLoaded.title: 수수료율을 로드할 수 없습니다. 수동 수수료를 설정하십시오.

GasLessThanEstimate.title: This may be too low, please increase

list.1: Disconnect and reconnect the USB cable without pressing any button.
list.2: Press both buttons three times to access the Dashboard.
list.3: Open the Manager and click Update firmware.

UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountReceive.title: Cannot receive on subaccounts
UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountReceive.description: If you want to receive funds, please use the parent account

UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountSend.title: Cannot send from subaccounts yet
UnavailableTezosOriginatedAccountSend.description: This feature will be added at a later stage due to changes recently introduced by the Babylon update.

RecommendUndelegation.title: Please undelegate account before emptying it

NotSupportedLegacyAddress.title: This legacy address format is no longer supported

BtcUnmatchedApp.title: That's the wrong app
BtcUnmatchedApp.description: Open the ‘{{managerAppName}}’ app on your device

DeviceNameInvalid.title: Please choose a device name without '{{invalidCharacters}}'

LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.title: {{message}}
LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum apps required
ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.description: Install the latest Bitcoin and Ethereum apps first.

UserRefusedDeviceNameChange.title: Rename canceled on device
UserRefusedDeviceNameChange.description: Try again and allow renaming on your device

SyncError.title: Synchronization error
SyncError.description: Something went wrong with the blockchains synchronization.  Please retry or contact us.

TronNoFrozenForBandwidth.title: No assets to unfreeze
TronNoFrozenForBandwidth.description: You do not have assets to unfreeze associated to Bandwidth

TronNoFrozenForEnergy.title: No assets to unfreeze
TronNoFrozenForEnergy.description: You do not have assets to unfreeze associated to Energy

TronUnfreezeNotExpired.title: Unfreeze is not available yet
TronUnfreezeNotExpired.description: You need to wait 3 days after your last Freeze operation

TronInvalidVoteCount.title: Vote format is incorrect
TronInvalidVoteCount.description: You can only vote using round numbers

TronRewardNotAvailable.title: Reward is not claimable yet
TronRewardNotAvailable.description: You need to wait 24 hours between claims

TronNoReward.title: There is no reward to claim

TronInvalidFreezeAmount.title: Amount to freeze cannot be lower than 1

TronSendTrc20ToNewAccountForbidden.title: Sending TRC20 to a new account won't activate it
TronSendTrc20ToNewAccountForbidden.description: The recipient account must be activated prior to sending TRC20 to it. Send either TRX or TRC10 to an account to activate it.

TronTransactionExpired.title: Transaction has expired
TronTransactionExpired.description: Signature must be applied within 30 seconds. Please try again.

TronNotEnoughEnergy.title: Not enough Energy to send this token

PairingFailed.title: Pairing unsuccessful
PairingFailed.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support when in doubt.

GenuineCheckFailed.title: Genuine check failed
GenuineCheckFailed.description: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact Ledger Support when in doubt.

EthAppPleaseEnableContractData.title: Please enable contract data in the Ethereum app settings

FeeTooHigh.title: Network fees represent more than 10% of the amount

StellarMemoRecommended.title: When sending to this recipient, a memo may be required
